Description: Cylinder seal of black steatite: with a wide perforation through the centre. The seal bears an incised inscription in four rectangular frames. Good condition.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit II (Wiesbaden, 1964), 1050, where the seal is incorrectly referred to as BM54451; P. Kaplony, 'Die Inschriften der Ägyptischen Frühzeit III (Wiesbaden, 1964), pl. 99, abb. 426.
